summary: A well-proportioned four-bedroom apartment located on Rowstock Gardens, N7, arranged over two floors and offering practical, well-balanced accommodation throughout. **Please note there is no lounge, as the former living room has been converted into a fourth bedroom.

customer.branchDisplayName: Alex Crown Lettings & Estate Agents, Islington

feesApplyText:
We require a Holding Deposit equal to 1 week's rent (approx £784.62) to secure the property. This holding deposit will be used towards the security deposit and rent in advance if the tenancy proceeds.

This property requires a Security Deposit of 5 week's rent (approx  £3923.08) 

The following fees may also be charged during your tenancy

Lost/replacement keys/security fobs
Rent arrears fees/charges
Change of tenancy
Early termination fee


Alex Crown Lettings & Estate Agents is a member of PI+CMP which is a client money protection scheme, and also a member of The Property Ombudsman which is a redress scheme.
